model.name: Component Version Restoration - Build-015 State as 0.3.0.2 with Scripts Linking
model.description: Restore all component versions from v0.3.0.0-build-015 commit as version 0.3.0.2 in each component directory and create proper scripts/versions linking for the clean recovery state.
model.rationale: TRON selected build-015 as clean recovery point. Need to restore all component versions from this commit as 0.3.0.2 and establish proper scripts linking for the recovered clean state.
acceptance_criteria: Restore all components from v0.3.0.0-build-015 commit
Create version 0.3.0.2 directories for all components
Copy complete state from build-015 to 0.3.0.2 versions
Create scripts/versions links for all 0.3.0.2 components
Ensure all components have proper shell scripts and CLI functionality
Maintain Web4 compliance from clean build-015 state

technical_details.restoration_process: Copy complete component state from build-015

model.implementation_notes: This restores the clean pre-violation state as new 0.3.0.2 versions, providing a clean foundation for continued development without DORY violations.
